body:
So I'm WaveConquerer.  I've been playing this server since the days of MCZ (i believe i joined when Nexus was new, before even Candoria was released, when it was just Lights Out v2 and Zoo.)  I have left and returned here several times and feel like coming back for my fourth run through  the server (i've left three prior times, mostly due to life things and boredom with the forums).  My favorite thing to do in regard to the server was play Nexus, Nebula and CTH.  I attempted to build a few maps for the server (i made five in total, and one has been accepted).  I would like to get back into making maps, if anyone would like to give me tips, tricks, and a bit of help finding SPC for Mac and writing YAMLs.  I use Teamspeak or Skype (primarily TS) if anyone wants to talk.  

I also have the tendency to be a bit of an ass, but i can repress it for the most part.

An outside interest of mine is Parkour, and i hope some kind of parkour can be found around here.

So thank you  for welcoming me to your server.  I hope to spend a lot of time slaying my enemies and having fun doing so!

title: Hello

replies.body: Had fun playing with you on TS the other day :D
